record.title: MORNING BUSINESS

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now be in a period of morning business, with Senators permitted to speak therein for up to 10 minutes each.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I yield the floor and suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
record.narrative: (The remarks of Mr. Bingaman pertaining to the introduction of S. 1185 are located in today's Record under "Statements on Introduced Bills and Joint Resolutions.")
